casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Calvin WILSON, Jr. No. 27P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 6, 2006. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th day of January 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review G.S. 7A-31":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of April 2006."
